snippet.title: M-PS2Craft Gameplay
snippet.description:
Credit all goes to the PS2 Revival Project!
Thanks to them, we have the first Minecraft Port to the PS2!
It's in very early development, so we should expect some additions later in the following years ;)
It also doesn't have Sounds yet...


The PS2 Revival Project: https://www.youtube.com/user/TmaxVideos

M-PS2Craft: https://youtu.be/mwmfJ7t8QzI

02/01/2022 - 1000 Views!!!
